definition: to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: People will always find the way that works best for them.
sentences.chinese: 人们总会找到最合适本人的申谢方法。

definition: to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
to greet/to go out to meet
to thank sb for favor (esp. emperor or superior official)
to express gratitude (esp. in public)/vote of thanks/also written 鳴謝|鸣谢
to exchange conventional greetings/to exchange pleasantries
to bow with hands held in front
to bow respectfully with clasped hands/to beg humbly
